lolChatClientPackage
Class VerySimpleChatServer

java.lang.Object
  lolChatClientPackage.LoLChatsClient
      lolChatClientPackage.VerySimpleChatServer

public class VerySimpleChatServer
extends LoLChatsClient

Simple Chat Server that uses socket connection to the client and upon receiving a message, returns the message to all clients connected to the server.

Author:
Luis Gonzalez, Clayton Walker
